title: Echoes in Velvet (벨벳의 메아리)
tags: K-R&B, Neo-Soul, Lo-fi Hip Hop, City Pop, Dream Pop, Chillwave
prompt:
[Verse 1]
The Rhodes plays low... a quiet confession
Your side of the bed, still holds an impression
*희미한 네 향기만* (huimihan ne hyanggi-man / Only your faint scent)
Is coloring this empty dimension

[Pre-Chorus]
And when I close my eyes, just for a moment
I feel the ghost of your fingers, a forgotten component
*점점 선명해져 와* (jeomjeom seonmyeonghaejyeo wa / It’s getting clearer)

[Chorus]
Oh, you’re the echoes in velvet, a beautiful ache
A warmth that consumes me for memory’s sake
This sensual sorrow, this bittersweet high
*넌 벨벳의 메아리* (neon belbes-ui meari / You're the echoes of velvet), a ghost in my sky

[Verse 2]
The lazy snare hits... a beat for the lonely
The window pane’s weeping, for me and me only
*네 목소리 없이는* (ne moksori eopsi-neun / Without your voice)
This silence is heavy, and holds me

[Pre-Chorus]
And when I breathe you in, just for a moment
I hear the ghost of your whisper, a loving opponent
*점점 선명해져 와* (jeomjeom seonmyeonghaejyeo wa / It’s getting clearer)

[Chorus]
Oh, you’re the echoes in velvet, a beautiful ache
A warmth that consumes me for memory’s sake
This sensual sorrow, this bittersweet high
*넌 벨벳의 메아리* (neon belbes-ui meari / You're the echoes of velvet), a ghost in my sky

[Bridge]
Is this a comfort, or just a beautiful cage?
Each memory a thread, I can’t turn the page
Unraveling slowly, a soft, suffocating grace
I need to let go, but I can’t leave this place

[Chorus]
'Cause you're the echoes in velvet, a beautiful ache
A warmth that consumes me for memory’s sake
This sensual sorrow, this bittersweet high
*넌 벨벳의 메아리* (neon belbes-ui meari / You're the echoes of velvet), a ghost in my sky

[Outro]
Echoes in velvet...
*벨벳의 메아리...* (belbes-ui meari...)
Just echoes...
That touch...
...fades...
